biotools.summary: MDock is a suite for molecular inverse docking and target prediction. MDock is an automated molecular docking software which can simultaneously docking ligands against multiple protein structures/conformations by using the ensemble docking algorithm. It supports docking/optimizing ligand(s) against either a single protein structure or an ensemble of multiple protein structures and score calculations for given protein-ligand complexes. The energy function used in MDock is the knowledge-based scoring function, ITScore.
